description: three beds with figures in a room: figure in bed on left side is sitting up; figure in bed in the foreground faces the viewer with their head resting in the palm of their hand; figure in bed on the right side at the back of the room lies prone; background is colored with dabs and streaks of blue wash paritally covering the room; bedspreads on each bed are colored in pink
inscription: LL of sheet, in pencil: Eigendruck. | LLC of sheet, in pencil: E.89 | LLC of sheet in pencil written twice, on verso: 2000
signed: LR in pencil, below image: Walter Gramatté / 23 / Dr Ra | LR of sheet, in pencil: \"Nächtliche Szene\"
title: Night Scene
